languages.text: В смерти Абеляр выглядит дряхлым старцем.

traits.locale_text: [DRAFT] Описание мертвого и сильно постаревшего Абеляра

languages.text: In death, Abelard looks like a decrepit old man.
languages.original_text: В смерти Абеляр выглядит дряхлым старцем.

traits.locale_text: In death, Abelard looks like a decrepit old man.
In death, Abelard looks like a decrepit old man.
In death, Abelard looks like a decrepit old man.
In death, Abelard looks like a decrepit old man.
In death, Abelard looks like a decrepit old man.

languages.text: 死んだアベラルドは、ヨボヨボの老人のように見えた。
languages.original_text: In death, Abelard looks like a decrepit old man.

traits.locale_text: 死んだアベラルドは、ヨボヨボの老人のように見えた。

languages.text: 阿贝拉德一动不动，看起来就是个老态龙钟的老人。
languages.original_text: In death, Abelard looks like a decrepit old man.

traits.locale_text: 阿贝拉德一动不动，看起来就是个老态龙钟的老人。

languages.text: Muerto, Abelard parece un anciano decrépito.
languages.original_text: In death, Abelard looks like a decrepit old man.

traits.locale_text: Muerto, Abelard parece un anciano decrépito.

languages.text: Im Tod sieht Abelard aus wie ein gebrechlicher alter Mann.
languages.original_text: In death, Abelard looks like a decrepit old man.

traits.locale_text: Im Tod sieht Abelard aus wie ein gebrechlicher alter Mann.

languages.text: Dans la mort, Abélard a perdu toute sa prestance et n'est plus qu'un vieillard décrépit.
languages.original_text: In death, Abelard looks like a decrepit old man.

traits.locale_text: Dans la mort, Abélard a perdu toute sa prestance et n'est plus qu'un vieillard décrépit.

languages.text: Abelard, ölüyken dermansız bir ihtiyar gibi gözüküyor.
languages.original_text: In death, Abelard looks like a decrepit old man.

traits.locale_text: Abelard, ölüyken dermansız bir ihtiyar gibi gözüküyor.
